title: Giulia Mazzocchi
summary: Giulia Mazzocchi is an Italian ice hockey goaltender, currently playing for HC Lugano and the Italian national team.In 2018, she was named Best Goaltender in the IIHF World Champhionships Division 1B.
content:
Giulia Mazzocchi is an Italian ice hockey goaltender, currently playing for HC Lugano and the Italian national team.In 2018, she was named Best Goaltender in the IIHF World Champhionships Division 1B.
